alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 23 at 4:32PM MST until August 23 at 4:45PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM MST FOR MARICOPA COUNTY... At 431 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Scottsdale Airport, or near Scottsdale, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Scottsdale, Fountain Hills, Paradise Valley, Carefree, Downtown Scottsdale, McDowell Mountain Park, Scottsdale Airport and Desert Ridge Marketplace. This includes the following highways... AZ Route 51 between mile markers 11 and 15. AZ Route 101 between mile markers 28 and 47. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
